title: Show 82 - KEVIN HAGUE
itunes:title: Show 82 - KEVIN HAGUE
itunes:subtitle: Kevin Hague is an entrepreneur and founder of 'Thâ€¦
description:
Kevin Hague is an entrepreneur and founder of 'These Islands', a forum to promote unity between the people of the United Kingdom. In this fascinating interview he outlines his work trying to hold the SNP's Sustainable Growth Commission to account and the pros and cons of making a positive case for 'the Union'. Tickets for Matt's Southbank shows are here: https://www.southbankcentre.co.uk/whats-on/133159-brexit-through-gift-shop-matt-forde-2018 Ticket's for the Leicester Square Theatre Christmas Specials are here: https://leicestersquaretheatre.ticketsolve.com/shows/873589775 Visit the website: http://www.these-islands.co.uk/ Follow Kevin on Twitter: @kevverage Follow Matt on Twitter: @mattforde

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
